title: WildFly 26.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 26.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about four weeks since the WildFly 26 release, so we’ve done a small bug fix update, WildFly 26.0.1. This includes an update to WildFly Preview.  The full list of issues resolved in WildFly 26.0.1 is available  Enjoy!
